cab.content: From General P lumen, Italy.To :- C.I.G.S., V/ar Office.Repeated G-.H.Q. , France.Handed ins- 10.48 p.m. 23.12.17. Received:- 6.30 a.n. 24.12.17.Oo 147,Today the enemy, after considerable artillery preparation, attacked Italian positions on Asiago Plateau. The Italians have had to vacate some of the advanced line, but no details arc forthcoming yet. At present the action is not regarded as anything more, than local.
